title: Pair of Earrings
description:
Gold earrings. Loop: an s-shaped wire with globule soldered at one end; the other forms a loop. On front face is soldered a square setting edged with twisted wire, containing a glass set (iridescent); pendant a gold bead attached to a twisted wire, having a pyramid of pellets below.
Condition: Excellent. Glass in setting iridescent.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
